Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Table of Contents and Split View features \(Phase 3 & 4\)

Phase 3 - Table of Contents:
- Auto-detect H1-H6 headings from note content
- Click-to-jump navigation with smooth scrolling
- Active heading indicator based on scroll position
- Indented hierarchy display
- Toggle via toolbar button or Ctrl+Shift+T
- Visibility persisted in localStorage

Phase 4 - Split View:
- Horizontal \(side-by-side\) or vertical \(top-bottom\) layouts
- Resizable panes with drag divider
- Reference note selector with search and grouping
- Lock/unlock toggle for editable reference
- Toggle via toolbar dropdown or Ctrl+Shift+S
- All preferences persisted in localStorage

Also includes notebook polish items:
- Bulk assign notes to notebooks
- Export notebook as TXT/MD/HTML/JSON
- Drag-and-drop notebook reordering
- Faded photo cover treatment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update The What and The How pages with new features

- Add paragraph about notebooks, split view, and ToC to The What page
- Emphasize that JustNoted stays simple by default

  - Organising with Notebooks
  - Split View for Referencing Notes
  - Table of Contents
  - Bulk Actions
  - Exporting Notebooks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
